channel.title: I finally got a working Pi client that i like but here's the problem
channel.description: ok i finally downloaded a fully working and right for my PI source/client... but the problem is i want to edit it... but there is no mypos command so i cant edit the postion of shops, beginning pos, etc.. please help?

item.title: I finally got a working Pi client that i like but here's the problem
item.dc:creator: @propker212 propker212
item.description:
@propker212 wrote:

Go to data>cfg>spawn config.cfg OR autospawn.cfg

Search for the NPC ID of the shop for Example

spawn = (NPCID) (SPAWN X) (SPAWN Y)

ok like for example. the orginal starting location was edgeville. but i change it to varrock but all the shops are still back at edgeville. im wondering how i could move those shops to varrock location including make over mage to pop up on screen when first log in as new user.

item.title: I finally got a working Pi client that i like but here's the problem
item.dc:creator: @propker212 propker212
item.description:
@propker212 wrote:

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“pickup”) && c.playerRights >= 1) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Use as ::pickup 995 200”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}
		}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: I finally got a working Pi client that i like but here's the problem
item.dc:creator: @propker212 propker212
item.description:
@propker212 wrote:

Server Sided
scr>server>models>Packets>commands.java

Code for mypos

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos") && c.playerRights >= 3) { c.sendMessage("X: "+c.absX); c.sendMessage("Y: "+c.absY); }
